15.content:
From the highest window at the Expansive Candy Factory, a young woman smiled down as a group of visitors were led towards the entrance to the factory. Her factory. Elena Exco, the chairwoman of Expansive Candy, was the daughter of wealthy industrialist Jonathan Exco, who had passed away in mysterious circumstances two years ago. Elena had been left her father's vast fortune in his will, and had, much to her detractors surprise, managed to turn around the fortunes of his small, failing company. Elena, with her business acumen, enthusiasm and passion for candy, had taken the company global in only a few months.

Now, the pieces were in place. The first factory was complete, stores opening up around this backwater town and customers eager to get their hands on her product. Elena couldn't wait to see the results. Once this town was hooked, she would move onto the next, and the next, and the next...

Elena saw her guests filter in through the gates and prepared to greet them. She took a moment to admire herself in the mirror of her lavish, brightly decorated office. She was only 26, but already a titan of the industry. Framed magazine covers from Time were across her wall, from when she had won "Youngest businesswoman of the century" a few weeks ago. Due to certain...enhancements she had discovered in her candy's properties, she had been able to adjust her own body in exactly the way she wanted.

Expansive Candy was no ordinary candy; it was manufactured with very special ingredients, discovered by her father, which, when consumed in refined form, could have a very significant effect on a person's body and metabolism. Elena, through trial and error, had found this out, and had been able to transform herself from a skinny geek to a gorgeous bombshell. She was particularly proud of her DD cup breasts and shapely bubble butt. Her stomach was perfectly trim and toned and she had even gained a few inches in height. She had dyed her hair purple, the signature colour of the company, and wore a white and pink striped skirt and purple tank top, which drew attention to her figure. She wasn't one for formality.

But unlike the candy that Elena had consumed to refine her appearance, the candy that her customers would be eating would be quite different. It was much more potent and uncontrollable, and would even effect their minds. She couldn't wait until she controlled the entire town...

Taking the elevator from her personal office to the ground floor, she stepped out to find her guests gathered around, waiting for her. There were four of them in total, all of whom had received a surprise invite to the factory for an exclusive tour. Elena had hand picked every one of them.

Her first choice had been Charlotte, something of a minor celebrity - or as a close as you could get to one - in this town. Charlotte was gorgeous, with supermodel good looks and impeccable fashion sense. She had long, black hair a perfect figure; not quite as curvy as Elena's enhanced frame, but certainly one to make any woman envious. She looked like she belonged on a movie set, not a factory floor. Despite her good looks, however, she had struck Elena as a little shallow and vain. She was mostly just known for being an Instagram influencer, rather than doing anything particularly noteworthy.

Beside Charlotte was a couple who had been invited on the tour together, Jenna and Matt. Elena had chosen them due to their great physical fitness. Jenna was a pretty, blonde girl in her early 20's. She had, Elena discovered, been a cheerleader in high school, and now she was a champion swimmer. Matt, her boyfriend, stood the tallest of the group at just over six foot, and was lean and muscular. He worked as a personal trainer at the local gym, and it showed. He had chiselled good looks, a handsome face and, Elena had to admit, a great body.

Looking like the odd one out was another girl, Sophie. Sophie had been chosen for the tour more due to Elena recognising her potential; she was a chef at a local cake shop, and had won awards for her recipes and designs. Cake wasn't exactly candy, but her creativity with icing, flavouring and sugar had appealed to Elena. Unlike the super fit Charlotte, Matt and Jenna, Sophie was a little shorter and less striking. She was very pretty, with a cute face framed by a thick pair of glasses and freckled cheeks. Her auburn hair was tied back in a pony tail, and she was looking around eagerly.

"Welcome!" Elena said as she approached. "You probably recognise me, of course, but I am Elena Exco, head of the company. You can call me Elena."

Charlotte looked unimpressed. Matt and Jenna smiled politely, and Sophie let out a small squeal of excitement.

"Now, I'm sure you're all eager to get on with the tour, so let's get started," Elena said, ushering her guests towards the large double doors ahead...

---

Choose a character to focus on:
15.title: The Grand Tour

choices: Charlotte keeps snapping pics, and Elena is getting angry...
Charlotte samples some of the candy fruit...
Charlotte receives an interesting message on her phone...
Charlotte wonders off from the tour...
151.content:
Charlotte rolled her eyes as the bizarrely dressed Elena lead the way. Why she had decided to choose that weird, multicoloured outfit was anyone's guess, but the girl clearly needed some fashion tips. Charlotte was still a little confused as to how she had even ended up on this tour; the letter with a free "golden ticket" had just randomly arrived in the post for her one day, and it wasn't like she usually blogged or live-streamed about candy. Her Instagram was usually holidays, clubs, make up and fashion.

Still, she wasn't complaining, it was a pretty exclusive invite, and if it brought her a few new followers, all the better. Charlotte had over 600,000 followers on Instagram, a twitch channel and an OnlyFans account where she posted lewd pictures of herself in skimpy outfits...or nothing at all. Her good looks had gotten her very far in life so far, and she usually took in a lot of money from her fans each month. Hopefully, she could attract some more revenue today with her live blogging the tour.

Charlotte had opted to wear an outfit that drew attention to her body today, as usual. She was wearing a pair of hip hugging denim shorts which just about covered her butt, with a tank top that was tied in a knot beneath her perfect breasts, exposing that toned, tanned stomach.

Producing her phone from her pocket of her denim jean shorts, Charlotte held it up and hit record. "Hey guys! Charlotte here, live from the new Expansive Candy factory. Guess who got a free tickettttttttttttttt?" She smiled, showing her whitened teeth.

"Excuse me, Charlotte ," Elena turned around to face her. "I'm going to have to ask you to put that phone away. Everything from this point on is classified."

"Ugh, fine," Charlotte sighed. "You heard the lady guys, guess I'm just going to have to let you know more later, chao!" She signed off and uploaded the video before continuing. She had no intention of just walking around here without taking any more pictures or videos. That would have made for a very boring day...

"Now, then onto the first part of the tour, the chocolate fountain!" Elena declared.

Charlotte followed, alongside the others, as Elena pushed open another set of doors and led them into what looked like a large, artificial garden. Instead of a factory floor, she found herself treading on very realistic grass. The room seemed to go on for miles, and she was amazed she had missed it when she first approached the building. Through the room, she noted that there were trees and bushes that seemed to be growing...candy? Candy canes stuck out of the ground, chocolate bars hung off the trees and candy flowers were growing on plants.

While Elena's back was turned, she quickly whipped out her phone and took a picture, before continuing on.

On the far side of the room was a huge, flowing fountain that connected to the ceiling and flowed into a river which ran through the centre of the room. Charlotte cheekily snapped another picture. She had to admit, it was impressive.
151.title: Charlotte

choices: Just one blueberry
Just one pear
Grand Tour: Another Fruit;Char
1512.content:
"Alright everyone,control your appetites,I'll answer any questions you may have." Elena said aloud. She seemed to want to add in the words "we are not children" but left it out in case her bosses overheard. The group all spanned out and Elena occasionally walked over to someone's waving hand.

Charlotte occupied herself by going over to the grove It was if someone took the entire world's fruit supply and made an orchard for them.While there were only one bush,tree,or fern for each fruit, all of them seemed to be ready to harvest. But the fruits that were on the greenery shined a little, as if they were covered in sugar.

"Is this a diorama? Some sort of artist work" Charlotte thought. "Does it matter though, i'm going to get so many hits, oh wait."

"Excuse me, Miss Elena?" The tour guide walked over to the Instagram e-celeb. Charlotte pointed a thumb at the area. "Why are the fruits all shiny? Are they fake?"

"Oh no dear, they are completely edible. These are our 'Candy Fruties' specially made and all around great. Actual fruits that taste much sweeter than their mundane counterparts." Elena explained. "Our eggheads did their best to make a special genetically modified plant that not only mimics all fruit bearing flora, but give each and everyone of them this luxurious gleam. And not only that, but you can eat the skin as well!"

Elena smiled at Charlotte.

"So I can just." Charlotte began to reach over to grab a fruit, Elena interrupted this action with a quick 'tsk' from her mouth.

"No, no, dear. If you want to eat some you'll have to give me a few moments to call in my workers. They'll prepare something quite delectable, but never eat a fruit straight from the branch."

Charlotte nodded and complied, Elena smiled at the girl and quickly made a call to someone, turning her back on Megan as she took the call. Charlotte watched for a few moments until she looked back at the enticing fruit.

"What harm can one fruit do to me? She already said its edible."

And with that, Charlotte picked what she'd stuff into her mouth...
1512.title: Rule Breaker

choices: Charlotte can't get onto the boat; butt problems
Charlotte gets on the boat and the flickering lights disguise her greening body
It looks like Charlotte and Elena are taking a different route down.
15122.content:
With some nimble steps and quick reflexes, Charlotte paced over to the fruit she had picked out when she first laid eyes on the garden. It was a pear tree that stood proud and high and Charlotte wondered how would she get up to the branches. She scratched her chin for a bit and jumped back in shock as the branch lowered itself down towards her.

"Um..hello?" She politely asked the tree. The branch drooped but didn't react to the woman's voice. The e-celeb took very precise steps until she could reach a hand towards the branch and pluck a fruit off. She jumped back,waiting for the sign that the tree was a sentient being. Nothing came from her theft.

"I better get outta here." She mumbled. Placing the pear into her pocket, Charlotte made her way back towards the outer rim of the garden. There Elena stood tapping her foot up and down,her eyebrow raised as the woman approached.

"Sorry Miss Elena, I was just trying to pick out my fruit for that 'delectable' food you were offering." Charlotte lied to the guide.Unbeknownst to her, Elena knew exactly what she had done. In some sealed off area of the facility, a small betting pool had been going to see what fruit Charlotte picked.

Elena skillfully acted as though she believed that lie.

"Why of course! I do apologize if I seemed like I was admonishing you for your selection." Elena said."Have you've picked your course?"

"Pear." Charlotte replied. Elena nodded at that fact.

"Good choice, well it seems the rest of our little group has gotten enough of out gardens and would like to see where our 'magic' happens. We'll meet at the tail end of the chocolate river." Elena explained. She sauntered off with a smirk, Charlotte shrugged at that fact. With eager hands,and a much more eager mouth, she took a bite of the pear. Instantly her taste-buds were overwhelm, it was like eating pear plus one!

Charlotte's bites became rapid chunk taking off of the pear, which she soon finished in under three minutes. She licked her lips and wiped her hands onto her top.

"Let's go see the rest of this place." Charlotte announced before she expertly hid the core of the pear under some shadowed bushes.
15122.title: Just one pear

choices: Jenna's POV...
Matt's POV...
Matt suggests they sample some of the candy...
Jenna suggests they sample some of the fruit...
152.content:
"She seems enthusiastic," Jenna nudged her boyfriend in the arm as they followed their guide through the doors.

"She seems nice," Matt shrugged.

"You were just staring at her boobs," Jenna said with a smirk.

"I was not," Matt said defensively. "They are pretty big though..."

Jenna and Matt had met in college, while he had been study health and fitness, and she had been taking business studies. Matt had made no secret of the fact that his ambition was to one day own and manage a gym in town. Jenna, however, was a little more uncertain as to what her future held. She had often been stereotyped as air headed in high school purely because she was on the cheer squad; but nothing could have been further from the truth, she had studied really hard, and got a first class honours degree in college...she just wasn't really sure what her future held now.

She and Matt had first met when they noticed each other on their morning jog. After two weeks on running past one another, Matt had finally plucked up the courage to ask Jenna out, and she had immediately said yes, having been hoping he would do just that. They had been together ever since, and now lived together, having moved in just after graduating.

They had both been surprised to get the invite to the grand opening of the factory, and Jenna hadn't even really wanted to come, but Matt had suggested she take a break from planning her future career to have some fun. What exactly was fun about this place, however, she wasn't sure...

As they passed through the doors, they found themselves in a large, open space resembling a huge garden. The room seemed to go on for miles, and she was amazed she had missed it when she first approached the building. Through the room, she noted that there were trees and bushes that seemed to be growing...candy? Candy canes stuck out of the ground, chocolate bars hung off the trees and candy flowers were growing on plants. There were also large, oddly shiny looking fruit growing everywhere; she spotted blueberries, strawberries and pears, just to name a few.
152.title: Jenna and Matt

choices: Go eat some of the candy forest
Go have some lunch with Alana
Go to The Cabinet
1523.content:
"You wanna try some of the candy?" Matt said to his girlfriend. Jenna smiled at the suggestion,her previous talk with the man faded away in her mind. The couple paced over to candy section of the land ignoring the fruits all around them. They gaped at the selection of confectioneries all around them.

"Hey what's that overthere?" Matt questioned. Jenna followed the man as he led them farther into the candy flora.

"What did you see?" Jenna asked.

"It looked like something glowed behind all this stuff. It was like it was metal or something." Matt walked farther inwards and Jenna soon noticed how every plant seemed to grow larger the farther they traveled. The candy though got more exotic in appearance, though not to the point of being alien.White chocolate bars and mint chocolate candy canes were just some of the new sweets that were revealed.

"Matt, I don't think we should be here."

"Why would they not cut this area off if they didn't want anyone to see it?" Matt answered. Soon though the duo came to a large clearing, a brief shadow passed by the pairs eyes, but their view was quickly filled by the area in front of them. A large house, which seemed to be made of gingerbread, was built with a small pavilion in front of it. A decorated fountain was the epicenter of this clearing. Tables, though untended,were scattered around randomly. One chair and table was filled however, with a young woman drinking from a teacup.

"Hello?" Jenna hesitantly introduced herself. The woman looked up from her cup and smiled, she placed it onto the table to greet the pair.

"Ah you must be some of the contestants, I'm Alana, pleased to meet you." Alana dusted herself off to give the pair an open handshake. She was dressed in a modest pair of workshorts and a sun-flower shirt;Matt noted her seemingly curveless body compared to Elena,though didn't choose to vocalize that point.

"What's this place?" Jenna said. She sat down onto a chair, while Matt stood looking at the working woman.

"This is The Cabinet,though management has some gobbley-gook name for it. Its where we display our really sweet stuff, things that are not planted in the candy forest." Alana explained.

"So is that where the candy for the factory is made?" Matt asked.

"Oh no, that's down the chocolate river, hopefully you'll see it during the tour. No, here is the place where our perfected goods are displayed." Alana took a sip of her tea. "You can knock on the door if you'd like, Denise will gladly show you what we have in stock at the moment."

"Noted." Jenna spoke. "But why change it out though? Who eats the candy or whatever else you have in there?"

"Us workers and the little gals. Ahh you don't need to worry about the little gals though, they won't bother you on the tour." Alana said nonchalantly. "Oh if you'd like, we can have a small lunch together, I can phone in Elena to tell her where you two are at."

Jenna and Matt shared a look, both pondered on what to do next.
1523.title: A Sample of Sweets (Jenna and Matt)

choices: The Chocolate Selection
The Gum Selection
Another Section
15233.content:
"Let's try The Cabinet,Matt!" Jenna asked excitedly. The man looked over to his girlfriend and nodded in response. Jenna 'squee' in delight as the two made their way from Alana towards The Cabinet. Alana smiled before she took out a walkie-talkie.

"Hey Miss Elena, yeah, two of the targets are making their way towards Denise." Alana spoke. She put away the walkie-talkie and continued to drink her tea.

The gingerbread building would've been quite imposing if it wasn't, you know, made of gingerbread. Was the building actually made of gingerbread though? That didn't make it look structurally sound. But if the duo dwelled on that thought, they'd have question the candy forest that laid behind them.

"Do we knock or?" Jenna asked until the door creaked open. The two jumped up in surprise, only to see a fairly tall woman peak her head out. She wore,of all things, a purple dress stylized to fit the candy themed surroundings. Her earrings were some sort of sweat.

"Welcome you two,I'm glad that two contestants have chosen to grace this humble abode." She stepped aside to allow the two in. The couple hesitantly walked in until the very calming looking interior made their journey inwards much less hair-raising.The smell of frankincense and hazelnut filled the air. Stairs that led to the second floor spiraled upwards. The two gaped in shock.

"Come, lets get to the store." Denise interrupted their gape. The duo nodded and approached what was probably the store section of this building. Glass drawers and stands greeted them, signs were placed on top of the glass that read what candies they held.

"Look around and tell me what you like.' Denise said.
15233.title: Go to The Cabinet

choices: Sophie wanders off and starts exploring on her own...
Sophie samples some of the candy...
Elena has plans for Sophie...
153.content:
Sophie was definitely eager to get started. Though the other guests didn't seem that into it, Sophie had been incredibly excited for this tour ever since she received the invite. She had no idea what she had done to prompt the mysterious invitation, but she half hoped, if it wasn't too immodest, that her work had somehow drawn her to the attention of Elena and her company. She had been following the young company exec admiringly for some time, watching her rise to fame and success. They were the same age, and Elena was a role model of sorts.

While Sophie certainly took pride in her work, she had started to feel like her talents were a little wasted at work. Her creativity was stymied and her bosses were quite controlling. They often put down her more esoteric ideas and designs, wanting things that was more traditional and conventional. Sophie was a shy girl, and didn't really have the courage to stand up to them. She had often found herself without much confidence. Even amongst this group, she felt a little invisible next to the glamorous Elena, sexy Megan and athletic Matt and Jenna.

"So, when do we get to see how you make the candy?" Sophie asked excitedly, sidling up to their hostess.

"I like your enthusiasm, Sophie," Elena winked at her with a smile. "But patience, there's plenty to see before we get there. I really enjoyed your cake decorations, such creativity."

Sophie clasped her hands together and gave a happy little squeal. "Oh my god, thank you so much. I had no idea you'd even seen my work but I thought maybe you might have I don't know oh my god..." She rambled on, fangirling enthusiastically.

Elena laughed. "Oh yes, I took the time to get to know all the guests on the tour. I was really very impressed with your cakes. You have a bright future."

Sophie couldn't believe what she was hearing. "Do you think I might be able to work for you one day?"

"Maybe sooner than you think," Elena smiled.

Sophie gave a little squeal again as Elena turned back to address the others, welcoming them to the first part of the tour. As Elena spoke, Sophie's head was filled with ideas about her future, what roles she could work in, what candy she could create, what flavours she could come up with...maybe she would have a job by the end of the tour! And her parents had always said it was a waste of her talents going into this business. Ha!

Sophie walked on ahead, following the other's into the first room. Instead of a factory floor, she found herself treading on very realistic grass. The room seemed to go on for miles, and she was amazed she had missed it when she first approached the building. Through the room, she noted that there were trees and bushes that seemed to be growing...candy? Candy canes stuck out of the ground, chocolate bars hung off the trees and candy flowers were growing on plants.

"This is amazing!" Sophie said out loud, running forward and admiring the garden. She couldn't believe they had created something so fantastic. She had to know more...
153.title: Sophie
